SEARCH
Package DBLayer

Class CategoryDAO

java.lang.Object
DBLayer.CategoryDAO
public class CategoryDAO extends Object
The CategoryDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to category operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CategoryDAO()
    Constructs a CategoryDAO object and establishes a database connection.
    CategoryDAO(Connection connection)
    Constructs a CategoryDAO object with a specified database connection.

  • Method Details

    • getProductsInCategory

      public List<String> getProductsInCategory(int categoryId)
      Retrieves a list of product names within a specified category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category.
      Returns:
      List of product names in the specified category.

    • getProductsInCategorytillleaf

      public List<String> getProductsInCategorytillleaf(int categoryId)
      Retrieves a list of product names within a specified category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category.
      Returns:
      List of product names in the specified category and its leaf categories.

    • insertCategory

      public void insertCategory(int categoryId, String categoryName, Integer parentCategoryId, String Description)
      Inserts a new category into the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category.
      categoryName - The name of the category.
      parentCategoryId - The ID of the parent category (null for root category).
      Description - The description of the category.

    • insertParentCategory

      public void insertParentCategory(int categoryId, String categoryName, String description)
      Inserts a new parent category into the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category.
      categoryName - The name of the category.
      description - The description of the category.

    • categoryExists

      public boolean categoryExists(int categoryId)
      Checks if a category with the specified ID exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to check.
      Returns:
      true if the category exists, false otherwise.

    • categoryNameExists

      public boolean categoryNameExists(String categoryId)
      Checks if a category with the specified name exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The name of the category to check.
      Returns:
      true if the category exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteCategory

      public void deleteCategory(int categoryId)
      Deletes a category from the database based on the category ID.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be deleted.

    • updateCategory

      public void updateCategory(int categoryId, String newName, Integer newParentCategoryId, String description)
      Updates the information of a category in the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be updated.
      newName - The new name of the category.
      newParentCategoryId - The new parent category ID (null for root category).
      description - The new description of the category.

    • getAllCategories

      public List<Category> getAllCategories()
      Retrieves a list of all categories from the database.
      Returns:
      List of Category objects representing all categories.

    • getCategoryById

      public Category getCategoryById(int categoryId)
      Retrieves a specific category by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Category object representing the specified category.

    • getAllCategoriesName

      public List<String> getAllCategoriesName()
      Retrieves a list of names of all categories from the database.
      Returns:
      List of category names.

    • getCategoryCodebyName

      public Integer getCategoryCodebyName(String categoryName)
      Retrieves the category ID based on the category name.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - The name of the category.
      Returns:
      The ID of the specified category.
